attributes.action: Create a law in the uk for bullying! Make the bullies and parents accountable!
attributes.background: To many children are taking their lives due to bullying and as a parent that has almost experienced this myself it has got to stop!! Bullies and their parents should be held accountable for their actions! Stand up make a change stop bullying now!!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to address bullying.
